duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute comprehensive sales and business development strategies to drive advertising opportunities with local businesses.
Lead, mentor, and develop a team of sales and business development professionals, guiding their efforts towards achieving set goals.
Analyze market trends, customer behavior, and competitor activity to identify growth opportunities and refine strategies.
Utilize proprietary software to manage customer pipeline and business operations, ensuring effective customer relationship management.
Facilitate events supporting local businesses in the community, cultivating relationships and promoting advertising opportunities.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Sales, Marketing, or a related field (Master's preferred)
